= Dry Testing Checklist =

This is a checklist of tests we can do 1-2 days before a water test in the MDA room.

  * Preparation
    # Charge the submarine batteries
    # Charge the netbook batteries
  * Dry Testing
    # Power on/off
    # Depth and yaw readings
    # Depth and yaw controllers
    # Depth and yaw logging
    # Webcam mounting, orientation, and video feed
    # Video logging
    # Ethernet SSH with external laptop/computer
